keywords.description: Completely removed from the game. Doesn't cause Last Breath and can't be revived.
keywords.name: Obliterate

keywords.description: A unit's spell-like effect that allows enemy reactions.
keywords.name: Skill

keywords.description: While attacking, it strikes both before AND at the same time as its blocker.
keywords.name: Double Attack

keywords.description: Lowest Power, with ties broken by lowest Health then lowest Cost
keywords.name: Weakest

keywords.description: The enemy can challenge this unit, forcing it to block.
keywords.name: Vulnerable

keywords.description: Get this effect when this unit attacks.
keywords.name: Attack

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by an Elusive unit.
keywords.name: Elusive

keywords.description: Heal our Nexus for the amount of damage dealt
keywords.name: Drain

keywords.description: Remove a unit from combat. It can't attack or block for the rest of the round.
keywords.name: Stun

keywords.description: Attaches to another card, trapping it. When the trapped card is drawn, perform the effect.
keywords.name: Trap

keywords.description: Inflicts damage beyond what would kill the target(s) to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: When I'm summoned, refill 1 spell mana.
keywords.name: Attune

keywords.description: Negates the next damage the unit would take. Lasts one round.
keywords.name: Barrier

keywords.description: Can't attack or block.
keywords.name: Immobile

keywords.description: A Captured card is removed from the game. It returns when the Capturing unit leaves play.
keywords.name: Capture

keywords.description: Set a unit's Power to 0 this round. It can be changed after.
keywords.name: Frostbite

keywords.description: Burst spells resolve instantly. The enemy can't act before it finishes.
keywords.name: Burst

keywords.description: Fleeting cards discard from hand when the round ends.
keywords.name: Fleeting

keywords.description: Fast spells can be played at any time, but allow the opponent to respond.
keywords.name: Fast

keywords.description: Excess damage I deal to my blocker is dealt to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: Get this effect when you play this unit from hand.
keywords.name: Play

keywords.description: While attacking, strikes before its blocker.
keywords.name: Quick Attack

keywords.description: Takes 1 less damage from all sources.
keywords.name: Tough

keywords.description: Return a unit to hand and remove all effects applied to it.
keywords.name: Recall

keywords.description: Heals fully at the start of each round.
keywords.name: Regeneration

keywords.description: Removes all text and keywords from a unit.
keywords.name: Silenced

keywords.description: Damage this unit deals heals its Nexus that amount.
keywords.name: Lifesteal

keywords.description: You're Enlightened when you have 10 max mana.
keywords.name: Enlightened

keywords.description: A champion levels up once this condition is met, even in hand or deck.
keywords.name: Level Up

keywords.description: Slow spells can be cast outside of combat and other casting. The enemy can respond.
keywords.name: Slow

keywords.description: The first time only Scout units attack each round, ready your attack.
keywords.name: Scout

keywords.description: This unit dies when it strikes or when the round ends.
keywords.name: Ephemeral

keywords.description: These abilities take effect when the unit dies.
keywords.name: Last Breath

keywords.description: Can choose which enemy unit blocks.
keywords.name: Challenger

keywords.description: These abilities trigger when you resolve a spell.
keywords.name: Imbue

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by enemies with 3 or more Power.
keywords.name: Fearsome

cards.name: Draven
cards.flavorText: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"

cards.name: Dawnspeakers
cards.flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

cards.name: Crimson Pact
cards.flavorText: "Delicious." - Vladimir

cards.name: Jinx's Get Excited!
cards.flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

cards.name: Glacial Storm
cards.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.

cards.name: Teemo
cards.flavorText: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"

cards.name: Lucian
cards.flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
cards.levelupDescription: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied <link=card.senna><style=AssociatedCard>Senna, Sentinel of Light</style></link> die<style=Variable></style>.

cards.name: Yasuo
cards.flavorText: "...always by my side."

cards.name: Heimerdinger
cards.flavorText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"
cards.levelupDescription: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Turrets<style=Variable></style>.

cards.name: Keeper of Masks
cards.flavorText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."

cards.name: Tryndamere's Battle Fury
cards.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

cards.name: Augmented Experimenter
cards.flavorText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.

cards.name: Mobilize
cards.flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

cards.name: Culling Strike
cards.flavorText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.

cards.name: Parade Electrorig
cards.flavorText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.

cards.name: Heimerdinger
cards.flavorText: "PROGRESSSSS!"

cards.name: Phantom Prankster
cards.flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.

cards.name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier
cards.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

cards.name: Academy Prodigy
cards.flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.

cards.name: Herald of Spring
cards.flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem

cards.name: Fae Bladetwirler
cards.flavorText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"

cards.name: Crimson Curator
cards.flavorText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"

cards.name: Iceborn Legacy
cards.flavorText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian

cards.name: Ghost
cards.flavorText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed

cards.name: Omen Hawk
cards.flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen

cards.name: Harsh Winds
cards.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

cards.name: Glimpse Beyond
cards.flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless Vindicator

cards.name: Elise's Crawling Sensation
cards.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

cards.name: Braum
cards.flavorText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

cards.name: Ancient Crocolith
cards.flavorText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."

cards.name: Swiftwing Lancer
cards.flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

cards.name: Soul Shepherd
cards.flavorText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.

cards.name: Eager Apprentice
cards.flavorText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.

cards.name: Darius
cards.flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Jericho Swain
cards.levelupDescription: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.

cards.name: Kinkou Lifeblade
cards.flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."

cards.name: Rimefang Wolf
cards.flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.

cards.name: Vanguard Defender
cards.flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

cards.name: Battlesmith
cards.flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.

cards.name: Tianna Crownguard
cards.flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

cards.name: Arachnoid Host
cards.flavorText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.

cards.name: Karma
cards.flavorText: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."

cards.name: Garen
cards.flavorText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”

cards.name: Stand Alone
cards.flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

cards.name: Jinx
cards.flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
cards.levelupDescription: I see your hand is empty.

cards.name: Decisive Maneuver
cards.flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Jericho Swain

cards.name: Fiora
cards.flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

cards.name: Puffcap Peddler
cards.flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"

cards.name: Brightsteel Formation
cards.flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

cards.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
cards.flavorText: "See ya!" - Jinx

cards.name: Elise
cards.flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.

cards.name: Relentless Pursuit
cards.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

cards.name: Magnum Opus
cards.flavorText: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza

cards.name: Paralyzing Bite
cards.flavorText: It was not the kiss he had in mind.

cards.name: Transfusion
cards.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

cards.name: Onslaught of Shadows
cards.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

cards.name: Legion Saboteur
cards.flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Jericho Swain

cards.name: Hecarim
cards.flavorText: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.

cards.name: Scrap Scuttler
cards.flavorText: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!

cards.name: Zed
cards.flavorText: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."

cards.name: Vilemaw
cards.flavorText: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise

cards.name: Greenglade Elder
cards.flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.

cards.name: Darius
cards.flavorText: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

cards.name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
cards.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

cards.name: Jury-Rig
cards.flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.

cards.name: Detain
cards.flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

cards.name: Avarosan Marksman
cards.flavorText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.

cards.name: Nimble Poro
cards.flavorText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand

cards.name: Scarthane Steffen
cards.flavorText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."

cards.name: Navori Conspirator
cards.flavorText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."

cards.name: Jubilant Poro
cards.flavorText: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder

cards.name: Shatter
cards.flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen

cards.name: Crystal Arrow
cards.flavorText: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe

cards.name: Arachnoid Sentry
cards.flavorText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat

cards.name: Rising Spell Force
cards.flavorText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal

cards.name: Mk3: Floor-B-Gone
cards.flavorText: "I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3

cards.name: Jeweled Protector
cards.flavorText: "In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle." - Saga of the First Lands

cards.name: Cursed Keeper
cards.flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.

cards.name: Undermine
cards.flavorText: "Time to go!" - Boomcrew Rookie

cards.name: Impersonate
cards.flavorText: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.

cards.name: Brothers' Bond
cards.flavorText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran

cards.name: House Spider
cards.flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise

cards.name: Judgment
cards.flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

cards.name: Used Cask Salesman
cards.flavorText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."

cards.name: Sump Dredger
cards.flavorText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.

cards.name: Mk2: Evolution Turret
cards.flavorText: "Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2

cards.name: Scribe of Sorrows
cards.flavorText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"

cards.name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud
cards.flavorText: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

cards.name: Kalista
cards.flavorText: "The wronged shall have their vengeance!"

cards.name: Entreat
cards.flavorText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry

cards.name: Night Harvest
cards.flavorText: Thin the herd.

cards.name: Kalista
cards.flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.

cards.name: Sown Seeds
cards.flavorText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma

cards.name: Ezreal
cards.flavorText: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"

cards.name: Unscarred Reaver
cards.flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Vrynna, Scarmother

cards.name: Death Mark
cards.flavorText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed

cards.name: Jae Medarda
cards.flavorText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.

cards.name: Shady Character
cards.flavorText: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"

cards.name: Shadow Flare
cards.flavorText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.

cards.name: Corina Veraza
cards.flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."

cards.name: Catalyst of Aeons
cards.flavorText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.

cards.name: Draven's Whirling Death
cards.flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven

cards.name: Crimson Disciple
cards.flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

cards.name: Enraged Yeti
cards.flavorText: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

cards.name: Mushroom Cloud
cards.flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

cards.name: Arena Battlecaster
cards.flavorText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.

cards.name: Zaunite Urchin
cards.flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"

cards.name: Inspiring Mentor
cards.flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”

cards.name: Reckless Research
cards.flavorText: Progress, whatever the price.

cards.name: Back Alley Barkeep
cards.flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."

cards.name: Spiderling
cards.flavorText: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

cards.name: Scuttlegeist
cards.flavorText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.

cards.name: Ashe
cards.flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."
cards.levelupDescription: You <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 5+ enemies<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crystal Arrow</style></link> on top of deck.

cards.name: Laurent Duelist
cards.flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian Ensign

cards.name: Trueshot Barrage
cards.flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal

cards.name: Mageseeker Inciter
cards.flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

cards.name: Dawn and Dusk
cards.flavorText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed

cards.name: Spider Queen Elise
cards.flavorText: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.

cards.name: Vanguard Bannerman
cards.flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

cards.name: Daring Poro
cards.flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.

cards.name: Legion Marauder
cards.flavorText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.

cards.name: Avalanche
cards.flavorText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.

cards.name: Counterfeit Copies
cards.flavorText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.

cards.name: Scaled Snapper
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.name: Yeti Yearling
cards.flavorText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper

cards.name: Sinister Poro
cards.flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.

cards.name: Crowd Favorite
cards.flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.

cards.name: Shadow Assassin
cards.flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.

cards.name: Scaled Snapper
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.name: Boomcrew Rookie
cards.flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."

cards.name: Draven
cards.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

cards.name: Mystic Shot
cards.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

cards.name: Anivia's Harsh Winds
cards.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

cards.name: War Chefs
cards.flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

cards.name: Ezreal
cards.flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"

cards.name: Scaled Snapper
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.name: Escaped Abomination
cards.flavorText: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.

cards.name: T-Hex
cards.flavorText: "IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself." - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8

cards.name: Reckoning
cards.flavorText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster

cards.name: Hextech Transmogulator
cards.flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"

cards.name: Darius's Decimate
cards.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

cards.name: Thresh
cards.flavorText:
Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...

cards.name: Lucian
cards.flavorText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

cards.name: Plucky Poro
cards.flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

cards.name: Garen's Judgment
cards.flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

cards.name: Commander Ledros
cards.flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

cards.name: Midenstokke Henchmen
cards.flavorText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."

cards.name: The Harrowing
cards.flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.

cards.name: The Undying
cards.flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...

cards.name: Sabotage
cards.flavorText: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur

cards.name: Stalking Wolf
cards.flavorText: "You cannot make a wolf from a hare." - Winter's Claw proverb

cards.name: Shen
cards.flavorText: ...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other.

cards.name: Laurent Chevalier
cards.flavorText: "...Good grief." - Fiora

cards.name: Absorb Soul
cards.flavorText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh

cards.name: Avarosan Outriders
cards.flavorText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.

cards.name: Crawling Sensation
cards.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

cards.name: Braum
cards.flavorText:
"Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!"
- Ingvar the Elder

cards.name: Shadow Fiend
cards.flavorText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

cards.name: Statikk Shock
cards.flavorText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger

cards.name: Spectral Rider
cards.flavorText: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.

cards.name: Tortured Prodigy
cards.flavorText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.

cards.name: Alpha Wildclaw
cards.flavorText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.

cards.name: Intimidating Roar
cards.flavorText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster

cards.name: Crimson Pact
cards.flavorText: "Delicious." - Vladimir

cards.name: Golden Crushbot
cards.flavorText: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.

cards.name: Legion Veteran
cards.flavorText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.

cards.name: Brittle Steel
cards.flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum

cards.name: Shiraza the Blade
cards.flavorText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."

cards.name: Oblivious Islander
cards.flavorText: Oh, the poor lad...

cards.name: Thresh's The Box
cards.flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

cards.name: Rummage
cards.flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx

cards.name: Katarina
cards.flavorText: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian Border Guard

cards.name: Scarmother Vrynna
cards.flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”

cards.name: Scrapdash Assembly
cards.flavorText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.

cards.name: Iron Harbinger
cards.flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.

cards.name: Black Spear
cards.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

cards.name: Hapless Aristocrat
cards.flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"

cards.name: Rush
cards.flavorText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.

cards.name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
cards.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

cards.name: Winter's Breath
cards.flavorText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.

cards.name: Remembrance
cards.flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

cards.name: Stirred Spirits
cards.flavorText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.

cards.name: Thermogenic Beam
cards.flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite Experimenter

cards.name: Fiora
cards.flavorText: "... and now I know."

cards.name: Avarosan Hearthguard
cards.flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."

cards.name: Captain Farron
cards.flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.

cards.name: Poro Herder
cards.flavorText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.

cards.name: Lux
cards.flavorText: "No more holding back!"

cards.name: Legion Rearguard
cards.flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.

cards.name: Mageseeker Conservator
cards.flavorText: "Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens." - Mageseeker's Handbook

cards.name: Unleashed Spirit
cards.flavorText: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.

cards.name: Vanguard Firstblade
cards.flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

cards.name: Blade's Edge
cards.flavorText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

cards.name: Silverwing Diver
cards.flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

cards.name: Staggering Strikes
cards.flavorText: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser

cards.name: Kalista's Black Spear
cards.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

cards.name: Legion Grenadier
cards.flavorText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.

cards.name: Decimate
cards.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

cards.name: Zephyr Sage
cards.flavorText: "As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'" - Saga of the First Lands

cards.name: Frenzied Skitterer
cards.flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise

cards.name: Legion General
cards.flavorText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.

cards.name: Legion Drummer
cards.flavorText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.

cards.name: Silverwing Vanguard
cards.flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

cards.name: Vengeance
cards.flavorText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.

cards.name: Laurent Protege
cards.flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

cards.name: Greenglade Lookout
cards.flavorText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."

cards.name: Astute Academic
cards.flavorText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.

cards.name: Teemo
cards.flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

cards.name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster
cards.flavorText: "After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name." - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5

cards.name: Unlicensed Innovation
cards.flavorText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan Philanthropist

cards.name: Succession
cards.flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

cards.name: Arena Bookie
cards.flavorText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."

cards.name: Whirling Death
cards.flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven

cards.name: Vanguard Lookout
cards.flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

cards.name: Scarmaiden Reaver
cards.flavorText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"

cards.name: Purify
cards.flavorText: "Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else." - The Mageseekers' Handbook

cards.name: Tarkaz's Fury
cards.flavorText: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere

cards.name: Heart of the Fluft
cards.flavorText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!
Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

cards.name: Snow Hare
cards.flavorText: "Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."  - Avarosan proverb

cards.name: Wyrding Stones
cards.flavorText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe

cards.name: The Box
cards.flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

cards.name: Final Spark
cards.flavorText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux

cards.name: Minah Swiftfoot
cards.flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand

cards.name: Vision
cards.flavorText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain

cards.name: Icevale Archer
cards.flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.

cards.name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger
cards.flavorText: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.

cards.name: Elixir of Iron
cards.flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper

cards.name: Kindly Tavernkeeper
cards.flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"

cards.name: Illegal Contraption
cards.flavorText: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections

cards.name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker
cards.flavorText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius

cards.name: Tryndamere
cards.flavorText: "...And make THEM die for it."

cards.name: Ashe
cards.flavorText: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"

cards.name: Accelerated Purrsuit
cards.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project Engineer

cards.name: Yasuo
cards.flavorText: "Death is like the wind..."

cards.name: Ritual of Renewal
cards.flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma

cards.name: Dauntless Vanguard
cards.flavorText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

cards.name: Stand United
cards.flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

cards.name: Twin Disciplines
cards.flavorText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma

cards.name: Balesight
cards.flavorText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.name: Mageseeker Persuader
cards.flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

cards.name: Minotaur Reckoner
cards.flavorText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."

cards.name: Battering Ram
cards.flavorText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."

cards.name: Vanguard Squire
cards.flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

cards.name: Ravenous Butcher
cards.flavorText: You are what you eat.

cards.name: Zed's Shadowshift
cards.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

cards.name: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows
cards.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

cards.name: Riposte
cards.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

cards.name: Mk7: Armored Stomper
cards.flavorText: "I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..." - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7

cards.name: Fresh Offerings
cards.flavorText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise

cards.name: Assembly Bot
cards.flavorText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick

cards.name: Windfarer Hatchling
cards.flavorText: "Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes." - Saga of the First Lands

cards.name: Poro Snax
cards.flavorText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan Treatmaker

cards.name: Crimson Aristocrat
cards.flavorText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

cards.name: Jinx
cards.flavorText: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"

cards.name: Battle Fury
cards.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.flavorText: "Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us." - The Vanguard's Code

cards.name: Chain Vest
cards.flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

cards.name: Zed
cards.flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
cards.levelupDescription: My shadows and I have <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice<style=Variable></style>.

cards.name: Katarina's Death Lotus
cards.flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

cards.name: Trifarian Hopeful
cards.flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran

cards.name: Braum's Take Heart
cards.flavorText: "... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!" - The Tale of Braum

cards.name: Mistwraith
cards.flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

cards.name: Elixir of Wrath
cards.flavorText: "When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist." - Noxian Axiom

cards.name: Silent Shadowseer
cards.flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."

cards.name: Haunted Relic
cards.flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.

cards.name: Mark of the Isles
cards.flavorText: Power, but at what cost?

cards.name: Shen
cards.flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."

cards.name: Precious Pet
cards.flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.

cards.name: Grasp of the Undying
cards.flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.

cards.name: Chempunk Shredder
cards.flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper

cards.name: Lonely Poro
cards.flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder

cards.name: Karma
cards.flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."

cards.name: Possession
cards.flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.

cards.name: Radiant Guardian
cards.flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian Ensign

cards.name: Eminent Benefactor
cards.flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."

cards.name: Death Lotus
cards.flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

cards.name: Mk0: Windup Shredder
cards.flavorText: "TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface

cards.name: Cloud Drinker
cards.flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.

cards.name: Laurent Bladekeeper
cards.flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

cards.name: Warmother's Call
cards.flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.

cards.name: Purrsuit of Perfection
cards.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project Engineer

cards.name: Blade of Ledros
cards.flavorText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.

cards.name: Funsmith
cards.flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"

cards.name: Splinter Soul
cards.flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier

cards.name: Atrocity
cards.flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.

cards.name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest
cards.flavorText: "Hasagi!"- Yasuo

cards.name: Recall
cards.flavorText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.

cards.name: Living Shadow
cards.flavorText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.

cards.name: Will of Ionia
cards.flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.

cards.name: Feral Mystic
cards.flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia

cards.name: Skyward Strikes
cards.flavorText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand

cards.name: Navori Bladescout
cards.flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"

cards.name: Icy Yeti
cards.flavorText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.name: Shunpo
cards.flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.

cards.name: Poison Puffcap
cards.flavorText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!" - Zaunite nursery rhyme

cards.name: Face-Melter
cards.flavorText: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder

cards.name: Mist's Call
cards.flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless Vindicator

cards.name: Catastrophe
cards.flavorText: Your end is MEOW.

cards.name: Trifarian Assessor
cards.flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General

cards.name: Prismatic Barrier
cards.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

cards.name: Vladimir
cards.flavorText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."

cards.name: Professor von Yipp
cards.flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."

cards.name: Mk1: Wrenchbot
cards.flavorText: "It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1

cards.name: Tryndamere
cards.flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."
cards.levelupDescription: If I would die, I Level Up instead.

cards.name: Bull Elnuk
cards.flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.

cards.name: Brood Awakening
cards.flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.

cards.name: Pack Mentality
cards.flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.

cards.name: Unstable Voltician
cards.flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.

cards.name: Wraithcaller
cards.flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.

cards.name: Sparring Student
cards.flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"

cards.name: Ashe's Flash Freeze
cards.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

cards.name: Tarkaz the Tribeless
cards.flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere

cards.name: Greenglade Duo
cards.flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"

cards.name: Blood for Blood
cards.flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.

cards.name: Kinkou Wayfinder
cards.flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.

cards.name: Single Combat
cards.flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

cards.name: Katarina
cards.flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
cards.levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.

cards.name: Shark Chariot
cards.flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon

cards.name: Avarosan Trapper
cards.flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."

cards.name: Progress Day!
cards.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

cards.name: Yusari
cards.flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."

cards.name: Troop of Elnuks
cards.flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Vrynna, Scarmother

cards.name: Health Potion
cards.flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.

cards.name: Chronicler of Ruin
cards.flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.

cards.name: Plaza Guardian
cards.flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.

cards.name: Ren Shadowblade
cards.flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”

cards.name: Anivia
cards.flavorText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."

cards.name: Ethereal Remitter
cards.flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!

cards.name: Clump of Whumps
cards.flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler

cards.name: Emerald Awakener
cards.flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."

cards.name: Take Heart
cards.flavorText: "... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!" - The Tale of Braum

cards.name: Savage Reckoner
cards.flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie

cards.name: En Garde
cards.flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

cards.name: Spectral Matron
cards.flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.

cards.name: Rimetusk Shaman
cards.flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."

cards.name: Deny
cards.flavorText: No.

cards.name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
cards.flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.

cards.name: Flame Chompers!
cards.flavorText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx

cards.name: Ancient Yeti
cards.flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.name: Vanguard Sergeant
cards.flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian Ensign

cards.name: Bullseye
cards.flavorText: Gotcha.

cards.name: Mighty Poro
cards.flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

cards.name: Navori Brigand
cards.flavorText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.

cards.name: Arachnoid Horror
cards.flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.

cards.name: Get Excited!
cards.flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

cards.name: Mk6: Stormlobber
cards.flavorText: "PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep." - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6

cards.name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
cards.flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

cards.name: Bloodsworn Pledge
cards.flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere

cards.name: Navori Highwayman
cards.flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”

cards.name: The Empyrean
cards.flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General

cards.name: Back to Back
cards.flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

cards.name: Vladimir
cards.flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...

cards.name: Flash of Brilliance
cards.flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.

cards.name: Ezreal's Mystic Shot
cards.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

cards.name: For Demacia!
cards.flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!"

cards.name: Basilisk Rider
cards.flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.

cards.name: Greenglade Caretaker
cards.flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."

cards.name: Radiant Strike
cards.flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

cards.name: Insight of Ages
cards.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

cards.name: The Rekindler
cards.flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

cards.name: Chump Whump
cards.flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler

cards.name: Hecarim
cards.flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.

cards.name: Brightsteel Protector
cards.flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

cards.name: Withering Wail
cards.flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.

cards.name: Amateur Aeronaut
cards.flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan Engineer

cards.name: Shen's Stand United
cards.flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

cards.name: Rhasa the Sunderer
cards.flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier

cards.name: Anivia
cards.flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."

cards.name: Affectionate Poro
cards.flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius

cards.name: Intrepid Mariner
cards.flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.

cards.name: Lux
cards.flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
cards.levelupDescription: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.

cards.name: Fiora's Riposte
cards.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

cards.name: Draven's Biggest Fan
cards.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"

cards.name: Glacial Storm
cards.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.

cards.name: Reckless Trifarian
cards.flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Jericho Swain

cards.name: Darkwater Scourge
cards.flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.

cards.name: Steel Tempest
cards.flavorText: "Hasegi!"- Yasuo

cards.name: Cithria of Cloudfield
cards.flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

cards.name: Vladimir's Transfusion
cards.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

cards.name: Fluft of Poros
cards.flavorText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"

cards.name: Fleetfeather Tracker
cards.flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

cards.name: Spirit's Refuge
cards.flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen

cards.name: Mk4: Apex Turret
cards.flavorText: "Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4

cards.name: Eggnivia
cards.flavorText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.
cards.levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you're <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>, transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> and Level Up.

cards.name: Sumpworks Map
cards.flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

cards.name: Might
cards.flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius

cards.name: Vanguard Cavalry
cards.flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

cards.name: Rivershaper
cards.flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."

cards.name: Chempunk Pickpocket
cards.flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.

cards.name: Starlit Seer
cards.flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."

cards.name: Solitary Monk
cards.flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."

cards.name: She Who Wanders
cards.flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.name: Tall Tales
cards.flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger

cards.name: Noxian Guillotine
cards.flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.

cards.name: Caustic Cask
cards.flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite Foreman

cards.name: Warden's Prey
cards.flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…

cards.name: Vanguard Redeemer
cards.flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

cards.name: Karma's Insight of Ages
cards.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

cards.name: Shadowshift
cards.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

cards.name: Crimson Awakener
cards.flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

cards.name: Mageseeker Investigator
cards.flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

cards.name: Kato The Arm
cards.flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."

cards.name: Vile Feast
cards.flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

cards.name: They Who Endure
cards.flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Tavernkeeper

cards.name: Cithria the Bold
cards.flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

cards.name: Yone, Windchaser
cards.flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."

cards.name: Ki Guardian
cards.flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen

cards.name: Redoubled Valor
cards.flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

cards.name: The Ruination
cards.flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.

cards.name: Thresh
cards.flavorText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...

cards.name: Guile
cards.flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc

cards.name: Babbling Bjerg
cards.flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"

cards.name: Garen
cards.flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

cards.name: Spinning Axe
cards.flavorText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena Regular

cards.name: Avarosan Sentry
cards.flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."

cards.name: Soulgorger
cards.flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier

cards.name: Fading Memories
cards.flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.

cards.name: Subpurrsible
cards.flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...

cards.name: Shellshocker
cards.flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand

cards.name: Wolfrider
cards.flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.

cards.name: Veteran Investigator
cards.flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.

cards.name: The Leviathan
cards.flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.

cards.name: Slippery Waverider
cards.flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer

cards.name: Loyal Badgerbear
cards.flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.

cards.name: Sap Magic
cards.flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

cards.name: Gangplank
cards.flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
cards.levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.

cards.name: The Beast Below
cards.flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam

cards.name: Gangplank's Parrrley
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

cards.name: Gotcha!
cards.flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"

cards.name: Prowling Cutthroat
cards.flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."

cards.name: Deadbloom Wanderer
cards.flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal

cards.name: Powder Monkey
cards.flavorText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand

cards.name: Devour
cards.flavorText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

cards.name: Pocket Aces
cards.flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Crackshot Corsair
cards.flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."

cards.name: Swain
cards.flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."

cards.name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain
cards.flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

cards.name: Yordle Grifter
cards.flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."

cards.name: Miss Fortune
cards.flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."

cards.name: Keelbreaker
cards.flavorText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.

cards.name: Caught in the Cold
cards.flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani

cards.name: Bubble Bear
cards.flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.

cards.name: Brash Gambler
cards.flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."

cards.name: Vault Breaker
cards.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

cards.name: Coral Creatures
cards.flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.

cards.name: Citybreaker
cards.flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”

cards.name: Greathorn Companion
cards.flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.

cards.name: Resonating Strike
cards.flavorText: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin

cards.name: Double Trouble
cards.flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

cards.name: Island Navigator
cards.flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous

cards.name: Jagged Taskmaster
cards.flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.

cards.name: Sapling
cards.flavorText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal

cards.name: Tail of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.name: Greenfang Warden
cards.flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."

cards.name: Shipwreck Hoarder
cards.flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher

cards.name: Quinn's Blinding Assault
cards.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

cards.name: Thorny Toad
cards.flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal

cards.name: Strong-arm
cards.flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer

cards.name: Citrus Courier
cards.flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."

cards.name: Terror of the Tides
cards.flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.

cards.name: Swain's Ravenous Flock
cards.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

cards.name: Miss Fortune
cards.flavorText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."

cards.name: Dragon's Protection
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon

cards.name: Insightful Investigator
cards.flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook

cards.name: Devourer of the Depths
cards.flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

cards.name: Fizz
cards.flavorText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.

cards.name: Valor
cards.flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.

cards.name: Chum the Waters
cards.flavorText: "Shark!" - Fizz

cards.name: Bullet Time
