cards.flavorText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...

cards.name: Grizzled Ranger
cards.flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."

cards.name: Lee Sin
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."

cards.name: Zap Sprayfin
cards.flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.

cards.name: Razorscale Hunter
cards.flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher

cards.name: Love Tap
cards.flavorText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune

cards.name: Neverglade Collector
cards.flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal

cards.name: Gold Card
cards.flavorText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Treasure Trove
cards.flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.

cards.name: Chief Mechanist Zevi
cards.flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.

cards.name: More Powder!
cards.flavorText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank

cards.name: Maokai's Sap Magic
cards.flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

cards.name: Aurok Glinthorn
cards.flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”

cards.name: Unyielding Spirit
cards.flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.

cards.name: Sheriff Lariette Rose
cards.flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.

cards.name: Overgrown Snapvine
cards.flavorText: "Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!" - Recovered journal

cards.name: Horns of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.name: Jagged Butcher
cards.flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.

cards.name: Twisted Fate
cards.flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."

cards.name: Cannon Barrage
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.

cards.name: Parrrley
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

cards.name: Abyssal Eye
cards.flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"

cards.name: Dragonling
cards.flavorText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon

cards.name: Sejuani
cards.flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
cards.levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.

cards.name: Jailbreak
cards.flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

cards.name: Pick a Card
cards.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Ember Maiden
cards.flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme

cards.name: Petty Officer
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.name: Petty Officer
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.name: Playful Trickster
cards.flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

cards.name: Riptide
cards.flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

cards.name: Blighted Caretaker
cards.flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"

cards.name: Lee Sin
cards.flavorText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."

cards.name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card
cards.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Eye of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.name: Nautilus's Riptide
cards.flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

cards.name: Claws of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.name: Maokai
cards.flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
cards.levelupDescription: Your units have died or your cards have been <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> 25 times.<style=Variable></style>

cards.name: Vi
cards.flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator

cards.name: Barkbeast
cards.flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.

cards.name: Dreg Dredgers
cards.flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.

cards.name: Ravenous Flock
cards.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

cards.name: Petty Officer
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.name: Swain
cards.flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."

cards.name: Nautilus
cards.flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note

cards.name: Stormclaw Ursine
cards.flavorText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.

cards.name: Gangplank
cards.flavorText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer

cards.name: Shared Spoils
cards.flavorText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider

cards.name: Dreadway Deckhand
cards.flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."

cards.name: The Dreadway
cards.flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"

cards.name: Powder Keg
cards.flavorText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying

cards.name: Concussive Palm
cards.flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon

cards.name: Imperial Demolitionist
cards.flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."

cards.name: Slotbot
cards.flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.

cards.name: Vicious Platewyrm
cards.flavorText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.

cards.name: Blinding Assault
cards.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

cards.name: Noxian Fervor
cards.flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain

cards.name: The Tuskraider
cards.flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard

cards.name: Sejuani's Fury of the North
cards.flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

cards.name: Dragon's Rage
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

cards.name: Trail of Evidence
cards.flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."

cards.name: Genevieve Elmheart
cards.flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.

cards.name: Scales of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.name: Twisted Fate
cards.flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."

cards.name: Hunting Fleet
cards.flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.

cards.name: Sejuani
cards.flavorText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"

cards.name: Retreat
cards.flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...

cards.name: Mind Meld
cards.flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.

cards.name: Ranger's Resolve
cards.flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden

cards.name: Scrapshot
cards.flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying

cards.name: Fury of the North
cards.flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

cards.name: Powderful Explosion
cards.flavorText: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank

cards.name: Smooth Soloist
cards.flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter

cards.name: Quinn
cards.flavorText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"

cards.name: Riptide Rex
cards.flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"

cards.name: Lure of the Depths
cards.flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.

cards.name: Sapling Toss
cards.flavorText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling

cards.name: Suit Up!
cards.flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

cards.name: Double Up
cards.flavorText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune

cards.name: Monkey Idol
cards.flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune

cards.name: Maokai
cards.flavorText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.

cards.name: Armored Tuskrider
cards.flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider

cards.name: Concerted Strike
cards.flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden

cards.name: Dragon's Rage
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

cards.name: Salvage
cards.flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk before all's lost to the deep.

cards.name: The Syren
cards.flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.

cards.name: Plunder Poro
cards.flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank

cards.name: Pool Shark
cards.flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler

cards.name: Hired Gun
cards.flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."

cards.name: Fizz
cards.flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...

cards.name: Pilfered Goods
cards.flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.

cards.name: Ursine Spiritwalker
cards.flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.

cards.name: Jaull Hunters
cards.flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.

cards.name: Platewyrm Egg
cards.flavorText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...

cards.name: Mystifying Magician
cards.flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"

cards.name: Longtooth
cards.flavorText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.

cards.name: Vi
cards.flavorText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"

cards.name: Blue Card
cards.flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Quinn
cards.flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight

cards.name: Ye Been Warned
cards.flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand

cards.name: Lee Sin's Dragon's Rage
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

cards.name: Return
cards.flavorText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.

cards.name: Red Card
cards.flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Deep Meditation
cards.flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate

cards.name: Golden Narwhal
cards.flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.

cards.name: Make it Rain
cards.flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

cards.name: Black Market Merchant
cards.flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"

cards.name: Black Powder Grenade
cards.flavorText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.

cards.name: Crackshot
cards.flavorText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair

cards.name: Vi's Vault Breaker
cards.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

cards.name: Warning Shot
cards.flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer

cards.name: Death's Hand
cards.flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain

cards.name: Patrol Wardens
cards.flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.

cards.name: Iron Ballista
cards.flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer

cards.name: Ruthless Raider
cards.flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.

cards.name: Fizz's Playful Trickster
cards.flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

cards.name: Nautilus
cards.flavorText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.

cards.name: Jettison
cards.flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer

cards.name: Sonic Wave
cards.flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin

cards.name: Aurora Porealis
cards.flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
